籤詩版本二:
Kana mafambiro emupikisi akakodzera, mutambo wakasviba nechena hauna kusarudzwa.
Isu tose tinoziva kukunda kana kukundwa nekuda kwekuita kumwe chete.
詩意:
Hexagram iyi chiratidzo chekusangana neanopikisa.
Zvakanaka kushandisa nhengo mune zvese.
解曰: Zvido nemafungiro. Sezvakaita Go. Kukunda pakupedzisira. Zvinokurudzirwa kushandisa scheming.
籤詩故事一:
◇Jiang Wei naDeng Ai kurwa kwakarongwa
Munguva yeHumambo Hutatu, Jiang Wei (Shu) uye Deng Ai (Wei)
Mauto maviri aya akasangana paQishan uye akarwa mumwe nemumwe mumapoka. Ose ari maviri mauto eWei naShu akatarisana nomuvengi mukuumbwa kweBagua. Apo mauto maviri akanga achirwa, Jiang Wei akavheyesa mureza wake ndokudanidzira, uye kuumbwa kweBagua pakarepo kwakashandurwa kuva gadziriro refu yepasi inomonereka, ichiteya Deng Ai. Gare gare akanunurwa naSima Wang.
(Nedimikira, kana watarisana nemamiriro ezvinhu akaoma, unofanira kushandisa uchenjeri.)
聖意: Imba yakagadzikana, iyo pachayo yakagadzikana, bhizinesi rinobudirira, imba haina kuyananiswa, mukadzi anofamba netsoka muLiujia anovharira munda, silkworms nezvipfuwo zvakuvadzwa, kutsvaga kunovharwa, mhosva yakakodzera uye kutama kunochengetedza. , pfuma yakarasika haina chinhu, hosha inonamatira dziviriro, guva regomo rinochengeta
古人: Jiang Wei naDeng Ai vachirwa hondo
